name: Dating Daniel
description:
Have you ever wanted to play a game where you date Daniel Kanno? No? Well too bad!

Credit for music -

Persona 5 - Atlus - Last Surprise

Persona 5 - Atlus - Beneath The Mask

100 gecs - Money Machine

Minecraft - C418 - Stal

Minecraft - C418 - 11

Danganronpa - Masafumi Takada - Danganronpa!

I beg you not to play this game
